articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Chinese stocks leave Asian peers behind in catch-up rally By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Waning China euphoria dents Europe and hammers Hong Kong
articles.content:
By Harry Robertson and Rae Wee
LONDON/SINGAPORE (Reuters) -European shares dipped and Hong Kong equities tumbled on Tuesday as a lack of details on China's long-awaited fiscal stimulus caused a rall… [+3111 chars]
